Q_DESC:
Brook Blossom is fond of division, but her teacher asked her to find GCD and LCM of very large set of  integers  A and B. She came out of an idea to develop an interractive C program to find the GCD and LCM of 2 integers. Can you help  her to come out of this problem.
INPUT
The first line contains an integer T, total number of test cases. 
Then follows T lines, each line contains an integer A, B and choice C.
C must be 1 to find the GCD and 2 to find the LCM.
OUTPUT
Display the GCD and LCM of A and B separated by space respectively.
CONSTRAINTS
1  T  1000
1  A,B  1000000
